net.realmproject.dcm.features.stateful

Interface StatefulDevice<T extends State>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DeviceEventPublisher, Identity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Camera, ICommandDevice, MjpegCamera, UrlCamera

    public interface StatefulDevice<T extends State>
extends DeviceEventPublisher, Identity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getState()
      Queries the state of this Device.
      default void publishState()
      Publishes the result of the getState method as a VALUE_CHANGED event
      default void publishState(State state)
      Publishes the given state as a VALUE_CHANGED event

      • Methods inherited from interface net.realmproject.dcm.event.publisher.DeviceEventPublisher

        publish, publish, publish

      • Methods inherited from interface net.realmproject.dcm.event.identity.Identity

        getId, setId

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        T getState()
        Queries the state of this Device. This method should return an object representing the full state of this device. While representing this device's state, this value should be stateless in the sense that an observer need not rely on previous values in order to properly understand this one.
        Returns:
        the current state of this device

      • publishState

        default void publishState()
        Publishes the result of the getState method as a VALUE_CHANGED event

      • publishState

        default void publishState(State state)
        Publishes the given state as a VALUE_CHANGED event
        Parameters:
        state - The state of the device
